name: CholesterolMeasureEncounterCodesHCPCS
title: Cholesterol Measure Encounter Codes HCPCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains encounters where cholesterol management would be discussed during an annual well visit by a primary care provider, including OB/Gyns.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes encounters for cervical and vaginal cancer screening.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
